 CREATE TABLE "QUARTO" 
   (	"TIPO" VARCHAR2(15), 
	"PRECO" FLOAT(126), 
	"DESCRICAO" VARCHAR2(240), 
	"ID_QUART" NUMBER GENERATED BY DEFAULT ON NULL AS IDENTITY MINVALUE 1 MAXVALUE 9999999999999999999999999999 INCREMENT BY 1 START WITH 1 CACHE 20 NOORDER  NOCYCLE  NOKEEP  NOSCALE  NOT NULL ENABLE, 
	"NUMERO" NUMBER, 
	"CARTAO" NUMBER, 
	"FUNCIONARIO_ID_FUNC" NUMBER, 
	"CLIENTE_ID" NUMBER, 
	"RESERVA_ID_RES" NUMBER, 
	 CONSTRAINT "QUARTO_PK" PRIMARY KEY ("ID_QUART")
  USING INDEX  ENABLE
   ) ;
